experience.description:
1. Development transmitter part of transponder of SSR (Secondary Surveillance Radar).
2. Development RF part of GNSS receiver (GPS/ГЛОНАСС).
3. Development control device to tuning RF amplifier for avionic applications.
4. PCB routing supervision.
5. Research works (e.g. lightning protection of transponders).
6. Conducting market search to find qualified modules for devices.  Technical correspondence and meetings with suppliers and manufacturers.
7. Document handling.

industries.name: Электронно-вычислительная, оптическая, контрольно-измерительная техника, радиоэлектроника, автоматика (продвижение, оптовая торговля)
Электронно-вычислительная, оптическая, контрольно-измерительная техника, радиоэлектроника, автоматика (производство)

experience.description:
1. Development and refinement hardware and software parts of the guard double position linear microwave sensor (X frequency range). 
2. Development standalone FMCW radar which works in guard radio system with integration with security cameras. 
3. Antenna & Antenna Array design and testing experience (Sub-1GHz & C & X & K frequency ranges). Measurement experience in fully anechoic chamber, semi anechoic chamber, shielded chamber.
4. Measurement RF parameters and redesign electronic devices for the compliance with European (EN300-220), Australian, Indian and UAE RF standards.
5. Redesign RF parts of serially produced devices to new frequency range.
6. Improvement RF parts of electronic devices to miniaturization.
7. Measurement and tuning RF parameters of receivers and transmitters (including climate tests) to assure the compliance with technical requirements. 
8. Test the wireless radio range of different RF fire&alarm sensors.
9. Supervision and optmization of electronic devices in mass production.
10. Conducting market search to find qualified modules for devices.  Technical correspondence with suppliers and manufacturers.
11. Technical assistance to clients in utilization RF alarm sensors.
12. Document handling.
13. Soldering THD  and SMD components in a process of improvement and repair of experimental and serially-produced samples of manufactured electronic devices.

higher.name: Peter the Great St.Petersburg Polytechnic University
higher.faculty: Institute of Physics, Nanotechnology and Telecommunications
